name: event-assertion
title: Event Assertion
description: A dwc:Assertion made by a dcterms:Agent about a dwc:Event.
rdfs:comment: A measurement of or fact about an rdfs:Resource (http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Resource).

fields.name: eventID
fields.title: Event ID
fields.description: An identifier for a dwc:Event.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.
fields.rdfs:comment: An identifier for the set of information associated with a dwc:Event (something that occurs at a place and time). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

fields.name: assertionID
fields.title: Assertion ID
fields.description: An identifier for a dwc:Assertion.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.
fields.rdfs:comment: An identifier for the dwc:MeasurementOrFact (information pertaining to measurements, facts, characteristics, or assertions). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

fields.name: verbatimAssertionType
fields.title: Verbatim Assertion Type
fields.description: A string representing the type of dwc:Assertion as it appeared in the original record.
fields.comments: This term is meant to allow the capture of an unaltered original name for a dwc:assertionType. This term is meant to be used in addition to dwc:assertionType, not instead of it.
fields.rdfs:comment: A string representing the type of measurement or fact as it appeared in the original record.

fields.name: assertionType
fields.title: Assertion Type
fields.description: A category that best matches the nature of a dwc:Assertion.
fields.rdfs:comment: The nature of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

fields.name: assertionTypeIRI
fields.title: Assertion Type IRI
fields.description: An IRI of a controlled vocabulary value for a type of dwc:Assertion.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.
fields.rdfs:comment: The nature of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

fields.name: assertionTypeSource
fields.title: Assertion Type Source
fields.description: A reference to the controlled vocabulary in which the definition of a value in dwc:assertionType is given.

fields.name: assertionMadeDate
fields.title: Assertion Made Date
fields.description: A date on which a dwc:Assertion was created.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a date that conforms to ISO 8601-1:2019.
fields.rdfs:comment: The date on which the dwc:MeasurementOrFact was made.

fields.name: assertionEffectiveDate
fields.title: Assertion Effective Date
fields.description: A date on which a state or measurement of a dwc:Assertion was deemed to first be in effect.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a date that conforms to ISO 8601-1:2019.

fields.name: assertionValue
fields.title: Assertion Value
fields.description: An asserted value, if it is not numeric.
fields.rdfs:comment: The value of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

fields.name: assertionValueIRI
fields.title: Assertion Value IRI
fields.description: An IRI of the controlled vocabulary value for a value of a dwc:Assertion.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.
fields.rdfs:comment: The value of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

fields.name: assertionValueSource
fields.title: Assertion Value Source
fields.description: A reference to a controlled vocabulary in which the definition of a value in dwc:assertionValue is given.

fields.name: assertionValueNumeric
fields.title: Assertion Value Numeric
fields.description: An asserted value, if it is numeric.

fields.name: assertionUnit
fields.title: Assertion Unit
fields.description: Units associated with the value in dwc:assertionValueNumeric.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the Ontology of Units of Measure http://www.wurvoc.org/vocabularies/om-1.8/ of SI units, derived units, or other non-SI units accepted for use within the SI. For units that are composed of multiple parts, use the patterns as given in "A Primer for Communicating Mathematics via Plain Text" (https://cse.sc.edu/~fenner/latex-ASCII.pdf) by Stephen Fenner (e.g., `g/cm^3` for grams per cubic centimeter). For other units, provide the value as a recognizable standard (e.g., '%') or written out in full and in the plural (e.g., `individuals`). It is fine to provide non-SI units in the original language of the dataset.
fields.rdfs:comment: The units associated with the dwc:measurementValue.

fields.name: assertionUnitIRI
fields.title: Assertion Unit IRI
fields.description: An IRI of a controlled vocabulary value for the units of a dwc:AssertionValueNumeric.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.
fields.rdfs:comment: The units associated with the dwc:measurementValue.

fields.name: assertionUnitSource
fields.title: Assertion Unit Source
fields.description: A reference to a controlled vocabulary in which the definition of the value in dwc:assertionUnit is given.

fields.name: assertionError
fields.title: Assertion Error
fields.description: The description of the potential error associated with dwc:assertionValueNumeric.
fields.rdfs:comment: The description of the potential error associated with the dwc:measurementValue.

fields.name: assertionBy
fields.title: Assertion By
fields.description: A list (concatenated and separated) of names of dcterms:Agents responsible for making a dwc:Assertion.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to separate the values in a list with space vertical bar space ( | ).
fields.rdfs:comment: A list (concatenated and separated) of names of people, groups, or organizations who determined the value of the dwc:MeasurementOrFact.

fields.name: assertionByID
fields.title: Assertion By ID
fields.description: An identifier for a dcterms:Agent responsible for making a dwc:Assertion.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.
fields.rdfs:comment: A person, group, or organization who determined the value of the dwc:MeasurementOrFact.

fields.name: assertionProtocols
fields.title: Assertion Protocols
fields.description: Names of, references to, or descriptions of dwc:Protocols used in making a dwc:Assertion.
fields.rdfs:comment: A description of or reference to (publication, URI) the method or protocol used to determine the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

fields.name: assertionProtocolID
fields.title: Assertion Protocol ID
fields.description: An identifier for a dwc:Protocol used to make a dwc:Assertion.
fields.rdfs:comment: The method or protocol used to determine the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

fields.name: assertionReferences
fields.title: Assertion References
fields.description: A list (concatenated and separated) of dcterms:BibliographicResources associated with a dwc:Assertion.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to separate the values in a list with space vertical bar space (` | `).

fields.name: assertionRemarks
fields.title: Assertion Remarks
fields.description: Comments or notes about a dwc:Assertion.
fields.rdfs:comment: Comments or notes accompanying the dwc:MeasurementOrFact.
